Class PDFGenerator

java.lang.Object
PDFGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentBuilder
public class PDFGenerator extends Object implements DocumentBuilder
PDFGenerator class responsible for creating a PDF document summarizing the test cases' results.
